title: Changes the name of the assembly committee on mental health, mental retardation, and developmental disabilities
summary: Changes the name of the assembly committee on mental health, mental retardation, and developmental disabilities to the assembly committee on mental health and developmental disabilities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2809

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ORTIZ -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Governmental Operations

       AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to changing the name of
         the assembly committee on mental health, mental retardation and devel-
         opmental disabilities to the assembly committee on mental  health  and
         developmental disabilities

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. That portion of subdivision 1 of section 5-a of the  legis-
    2  lative  law  entitled  "ASSEMBLYMEN  SERVING  IN  SPECIAL  CAPACITY", as
    3  amended by section 3 of part XX of chapter 56 of the laws  of  2009,  is
    4  amended to read as follows:
